name: Tanishq Singhai
about: I'm a software engineer with a focus on building intuitive and efficient software. My current project involves building the next-generation Thyrocare portal's frontend using React and Typescript. I've also gained quite some experience in Android and API creation. I have a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, DBMS, and OOP, which enables me to deliver scalable and maintainable solutions.
